about_the_game:
Control Yourself has a unique, yet powerful twin stick control system. You control the main character in a different way from conventional games. The player can run and jump around as usual, but now they can also manipulate their environment and climb around the world in a fun and natural way. This opens up a rich veins of new and exciting gameplay.

The demo introduces our hero and shows off the new control system. Introducing a variety of gameplay elements to showcase some of what can be expected from the main game.

See the construction of your new robot as he is pieced together. Get to grips with your new environment and get a taste of what your future life will bring.
Try out your new arms and legs, running, jumping, climbing and flying in the apparent safety of the Control Yourself Industries development facility. Show your creators that you have what it takes to fulfill your destiny and operate in deep space.

name: Control Yourself Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Try a new way of running, jumping, climbing, and flying.
